level.heading: Disclaimer of interest by trustee.
level.text: If a trustee disclaims an interest in property that otherwise would have become trust property, the interest does not become trust property.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 19-1506.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-205
level.text: For Law 16-205, see notes following ยง 19-1501.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999).
